summary: FORD TRUCK.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO FUEL TANK STRAP RECALL NOTICE.  *SMD  THE CONSUMER STATED HE HAS 19 FORD TRUCKS THAT ARE INVOLVED IN THE RECALL, SOME OF WHICH ARE NOT REGISTERED AND ONLY USED ON THE FARM. HOWEVER, IT WOULD BE VERY COSTLY TO TOW THE TRUCKS BOTH WAYS TO THE DEALER TO REPLACE THE FUEL TANK STRAPS. THE CONSUMER REQUESTED TO HAVE PARTS PROVIDED TO HIM, SO HE COULD INSTALL THEM AT HIS REPAIR FACILITY.  FORD MOTOR COMPANY INFORMED HIM, THERE WAS NO OTHER ALTERNATIVE, BUT TO TAKE THE TRUCKS TO THE DEALER.
